name: backendphonebook
description: Backend for the exercises on th FSH course

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../FullStackOpen2023Exercises/part2/phonebook && npm run build && cp -r build ../BackendPhonebook
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push

author: Dario Barrionuevo
